channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: ニューズ・コーポレーション、第3四半期の売上高は前年同期比1％減の24億2000万ドル、純利益は同40％減の3000万ドル、広告収入は同8.9％減の3億5800万ドル、デジタル契約者数は37億1500万人（Jeffrey A. Trachtenberg/Wall Street ...）
item.description:
Jeffrey A. Trachtenberg / Wall Street Journal:
News Corp reports Q3 revenue down 1% YoY to $2.42B, net profit down 40% YoY to $30M, ad revenue fell 8.9% YoY to $358M, and 3.715M digital subscribers  —  News Corp posted lower quarterly revenue and earnings due to a slowdown in advertising and declines at its overseas newspaper unit and subscription-video business.

item.title: WBD、第1四半期の売上高は前年同期比7%減の$99.6億、純損失は前年同期比10%減の$9.66億、TV収入は前年同期比8%減の$51.3億、スタジオ収入は前年同期比13%減の$28.2億 (Jennifer Maas/Variety)
item.description:
Jennifer Maas / Variety:
WBD reports Q1 revenue down 7% YoY to $9.96B, and a $966M net loss, down 10% YoY, as TV revenue fell 8% YoY to $5.13B and studio revenue fell 13% YoY to $2.82B  —  Warner Bros. Discovery reported its first-quarter 2024 earnings Thursday, revealing it had reached 99.6 million paid streaming subscribers …

item.title: WBDの報告によると、ストリーミングを含むDTC部門の第1四半期の利益は$86Mで、2023年第1四半期の$50Mから増加、ストリーミング加入者数は99.6Mで、2023年第4四半期の97.7Mから増加 (Georg Szalai/The Hollywood Reporter)
item.description:
Georg Szalai / The Hollywood Reporter:
WBD reports a $86M profit in Q1 for its DTC unit, which includes streaming, up from $50M in Q1 2023, and 99.6M streaming subscribers, up from 97.7M in Q4 2023  —  The entertainment conglomerate led by CEO David Zaslav reported its first-quarter results.

item.title: ITV、第1四半期の売上高は前年同期比7％減の8億8,700万ポンド、広告収入は同3％増、デジタル広告収入は同14％増、ITVスタジオ収入は同16％減の3億8,200万ポンド（Naman Ramachandran/Variety）
item.description:
Naman Ramachandran / Variety:
ITV reports Q1 revenue down 7% YoY to £887M, ad revenue up 3% YoY, digital ad revenue up 14% YoY, and ITV Studios revenue down 16% YoY to £382M  —  U.K. broadcaster ITV has reported mixed financial fortunes for the first quarter of 2024.  —  Its advertising revenue growth of 3% …

item.title: シンガポール人作家の中には、多言語LLMを養成するために彼らの作品を使用するという政府の要請に抵抗する者もおり、報酬やその他の問題がほとんど明確になっていないことを理由にしている（Nicholas Yong/Rest of World）
item.description:
Nicholas Yong / Rest of World:
Some Singaporean writers resist the government's request to use their works to train a multilingual LLM, citing little clarity on compensation and other issues  —  Singapore's literary community is pushing back against an official effort to train LLMs using their published works, part of a growing global resistance.

item.title: 国連人権高等弁務官、ロシアのジャーナリスト弾圧を非難。現在、少なくとも30人のジャーナリストが様々な刑事容疑で拘束されている（Lisa Schlein/Voice of America）
item.description:
Lisa Schlein / Voice of America:
The UN high commissioner for human rights condemns Russia's crackdown on journalists; at least 30 journalists are currently detained on various criminal charges  —  United Nations High Commissioner for Human Rights Volker Türk on Tuesday condemned Russia's brutal crackdown on journalists …

item.title: 情報筋：ソニーとアポロがパラマウント・グローバルを買収した場合、パラマウント・ピクチャーズは残したまま、CBS、MTVなどのケーブルチャンネル、パラマウント＋を売却する計画（ニューヨーク・タイムズ紙）
item.description:
New York Times:
Sources: if Sony and Apollo acquire Paramount Global, they plan to sell off CBS, cable channels like MTV, and Paramount+, while keeping Paramount Pictures  —  CBS and other well-known properties would be sold if Sony and Apollo are able to buy Paramount.  But the new owners would keep the movie studio.

item.title: ディズニーとWBD、Disney+、Hulu、Maxのストリーミングバンドルを発表、広告付きプランと広告なしプランがあり、米国で今夏から開始、価格は今後決定（Dade Hayes/Deadline）
item.description:
Dade Hayes / Deadline:
Disney and WBD announce a streaming bundle of Disney+, Hulu, and Max, with ad-supported and ad-free plans, beginning this summer in the US, with pricing to come  —  Disney and Warner Bros. Discovery are breaking ground in streaming with a bundled offering featuring Disney+, Hulu and Max in a single package.

item.title: 研究者たちメタのカナダ・ニュース禁止により、報道機関のフェイスブックへの投稿は大幅に減少し、ニュース記事のスクリーンショット付き投稿が激増した（Laura Hazard Owen/Nieman Lab）
item.description:
Laura Hazard Owen / Nieman Lab:
Researchers: Meta's Canada news ban resulted in news outlets posting much less on Facebook, and posts with screenshots of news stories increasing dramatically  —  “We observe a dramatic increase in posts containing screenshots of Canadian news stories in the post-ban period.”

item.title: ウクライナの調査報道ジャーナリストはどのように脅迫に直面しているのか、愛国主義がジャーナリズムに優先すると考え、報道機関が検閲を行っているのではないかと心配する声もある（Jamie Dettmer/Politico）
item.description:
Jamie Dettmer / Politico:
How investigative journalists in Ukraine face increasing intimidation, as some worry outlets are censoring themselves, seeing patriotism as trumping journalism  —  Jamie Dettmer is opinion editor at POLITICO Europe.  —  KYIV — “I ran investigations for 15 years before the war, and it was always hard and risky.

item.title: Skyは、EFLとのパートナーシップの一環として、イングランドサッカーリーグなどの中継を増やす8月開始の新サービス「Sky Sports+」を発表（Nik Roseveare/Advanced Television）
item.description:
Nik Roseveare / Advanced Television:
Sky announces Sky Sports+, a new service starting in August that will increase coverage of the English Football League and more, as part of its EFL partnership  —  Sky has announced it will launch Sky Sports+ this August, a service it says will be “transformational in the amount of choice sports fans …

item.title: The New York Times Games、"Games "および "All Access "購読者向けに過去1,000問以上のWordleアーカイブを提供、NYT GamesアプリにWordleBotを追加（Aisha Malik/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Aisha Malik / TechCrunch:
The New York Times Games rolls out a Wordle archive with 1,000+ past puzzles for “Games” and “All Access” subscribers, and adds its WordleBot to NYT Games app  —  The New York Times Games announced on Tuesday that it's launching a Wordle archive …

item.title: 情報筋WBDは来年の財務目標を達成するため、さらなるレイオフの可能性も含め、さらなるコスト削減を計画しており、マックスの値上げを決定した（Lucas Shaw/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Lucas Shaw / Bloomberg:
Sources: WBD plans more cost cutting to hit financial targets for next year, including the possibility of more layoffs, and has decided to raise Max prices  —  - Job cuts are possible as executives look for more savings  — CEO eyes streaming operations' marketing, technology costs

item.title: スポーツ・イラストレイテッド誌のフェイク・ライターの背後にあるアドヴォン社を調査したところ、LAタイムズ紙、マイアミ・ヘラルド紙などのAIコンテンツとフェイク・ライターが見つかった（Maggie Harrison Dupré/Futurism）。
item.description:
Maggie Harrison Dupré / Futurism:
An investigation into AdVon, the company behind Sports Illustrated's fake writers, finds its AI content and fake authors at the LA Times, Miami Herald, and more  —  A few years back, a writer in a developing country started doing contract work for a company called AdVon Commerce …

item.title: ディズニー・アドバタイジングがウォルマート・コネクトと契約し、広告主がウォルマートのショッパーデータを利用して、ディズニー＋やHuluを含むディズニーのストリーマーをターゲットにできるようになる（Kathryn Lundstrom/Adweek）
item.description:
Kathryn Lundstrom / Adweek:
Disney Advertising strikes a deal with Walmart Connect to let advertisers target Disney's streamers, including Disney+ and Hulu, using Walmart's shopper data  —  The new retailer-CTV partnership promises detailed sales attribution data  —  Disney Advertising struck a deal with Walmart Connect …
